Transcription for 547088

Alleluia!
News of every saving birth,
Alleluia!
Shall resound throughout the earth,
Alleluia!
They shall preach Christ's gladness praise,
Alleluia!
To the throngs of every race,
Alleluia!
They shall hear the trumpet sound,
Alleluia!
The sound waves shall fall around,
Alleluia!
Alleluia!
Alleluia!
The earth shall never again
Cross the whole field,
May all good works that I did,
Then, God, glory and
Joy, and love, and strength, and peace,
Alleluia!
When the earth is blessed with glass,
Let the people
Alleluia!
May God bless, God of faith,
The Lord,
May the Spirit of faith
In the life of
Thee, who therein all yon live,
Alleluia!
Alleluia!
